data.message: I absolutely  love it!! Without you staff team and the EEO. You have made my life easier with Facebook to able to communicate with others hearing and deaf friends, my family, the picture of our beautiful family and friends. We have learned to see the beautiful people but yes to protect our private in facebook and our life. But to creative the best talent people with a strong positive, skills and those who have succeeded. I ve made a very successful to my business and my acting career and reach out by my love and movavtions!! FACEBOOK IS ONE OF THE TOP connection, communication, community and network team... Thank you for your extrodarary hard work you do. I love facebook !! Deaf Actress/Ellen Rice

replies.message: We're happy to hear that, Ellen. We'll tell our team to keep up the good work. Happy Friends Day! -Jon
